title: I NEEED HELP
body: I brought rp with my phone, and i didn't get rp and money on my phone is gone! I need help!

replies.body: Your transaction could still be processing.  If you're still unable to see a balance update on your account, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our billing team can take a look for you!
